title: Berry/Bounty
lines: Berry is the currency of the One Piece world. It is used to trade with villagers.
Berries are obtained by killing Marines, Pirates and Villagers and can be found in chests as a loot.
Berries can also be obtained by trading items with Villagers
A bounty is a reward placed on an individual and is awarded to whoever can kill that player.
The player that manages to kill another player with bounty will get the 30% of his bounty, while the killed player will lose 35% of his bounty.
In case the player is not killed by another player the player will lose 10% of his bounty.
For instance if a player with 15000B bounty is killed, the killer's bounty will be raises by 4500B, while the killed player's new bounty will be 9750B
A bounty of over 1000B will cause you to be targeted by Marines, while a bounty of bellow 5000B will cause you to be targeted by Bandits.
Bounty is also required to start your own Crew.
